original_text: So Abimelech rose early in the morning and called all his servants and told them all these things. And the men were very much afraid.
korean_text: 아비멜렉이 그 날 아침에 일찍이 일어나 모든 종들을 불러 그 모든 일을 말하여 들려 주니 그들이 심히 두려워하였더라

sentences.original_text: So Abimelech rose early in the morning
and told them all these things
And the men were very much afraid
